multiple-choice.question: You choose a uniformly random element, say $a$, from the set $\{1,2,\dots,100\}$, and you choose a uniformly random element, say $b$, from the same set $\{1,2,\dots,100\}$. ($a$ and $b$ are chosen independently of each other.) Define the random variable $X$ to be [defs] X = $\max(a,b)$. [/defs] What is the expected value $\mathbb{E}(X)$ of the random variable $X$?
